description:
The law firm of Berenson & Associates, PC, in Albuquerque, New Mexico, is dedicated to helping injured people with their nursing home abuse and personal injury claims. Our attorneys have more than two decades of experience fighting for clients who have been injured through no fault of their own and seek justice and fair compensation for their injuries.

Berenson & Associates, PC, thrives on building a solid foundation of trust with our clients, so when you or a family member have been injured, abused or suffered workplace retaliation, our honest and caring attorneys will be your voice and zealously defend your rights to bring you justice.

People come to the firm at a time of need — they have been injured, a family member has suffered fatal injuries, a relative is the victim of nursing home abuse, or a person's job is at risk due to workplace safety or rights violations. Our lawyers understand that when people need a voice and someone to stand up for them, they come to us — and we will provide honest, caring and effective representation so that their trust is rewarded with someone who will fight for justice on their behalf.
